drinkRegister.name: Mojito
drinkRegister.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

drinkRegister.name: Old Fashioned
drinkRegister.instructions:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Long Island Tea
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Negroni
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Whiskey Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

drinkRegister.name: Dry Martini
drinkRegister.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

drinkRegister.name: Daiquiri
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Margarita
drinkRegister.instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

drinkRegister.name: Manhattan
drinkRegister.instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

drinkRegister.name: Moscow Mule
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

drinkRegister.name: After Dinner Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinkRegister.name: After Supper Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Alabama Slammer
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Alaska Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Alexander
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Brandy Alexander
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Alfie Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Algonquin
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Allegheny
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Allies Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Almeria
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Almond Joy
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto And Cream
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Mist
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Rose
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Stinger
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Tea
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Angel Face
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Applecar
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Apricot Lady
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

drinkRegister.name: Archbishop
drinkRegister.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Arise My Love
drinkRegister.instructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Arthur Tompkins
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: Artillery
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Balmoral
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Banana Daiquiri
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Bermuda Highball
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinkRegister.name: Black Russian
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinkRegister.name: Blackthorn
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Bloody Maria
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Bloody Mary
drinkRegister.instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

drinkRegister.name: Blue Lagoon
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Blue Margarita
drinkRegister.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Blue Mountain
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

drinkRegister.name: Bluebird
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Boomerang
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Boston Sidecar
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Boston Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Classic Old-Fashioned
drinkRegister.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

drinkRegister.name: Bourbon Sling
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: Bourbon Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Boxcar
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinkRegister.name: Brandy Cobbler
drinkRegister.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinkRegister.name: Brandy Flip
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinkRegister.name: Brandy Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Caipirinha
drinkRegister.instructions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.

drinkRegister.name: California Lemonade
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the cherry and serve with a straw.

drinkRegister.name: Casa Blanca
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Casino Royale
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinkRegister.name: Champagne Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Cherry Rum
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Chicago Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Chocolate Black Russian
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

drinkRegister.name: City Slicker
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Clove Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Cuba Libre
drinkRegister.instructions: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinkRegister.name: Dragonfly
drinkRegister.instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinkRegister.name: Dry Rob Roy
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: Dubonnet Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinkRegister.name: English Highball
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinkRegister.name: English Rose Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Flying Dutchman
drinkRegister.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Flying Scotchman
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Foxy Lady
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: French "75"
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the Champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Frisco Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Frozen Daiquiri
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Gentleman's Club
drinkRegister.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Gin And Tonic
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Cooler
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Daisy
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Sling
drinkRegister.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Smash
drinkRegister.instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Squirt
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Swizzle
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Toddy
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Godchild
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Godfather
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinkRegister.name: Godmother
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Grass Skirt
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

drinkRegister.name: Harvey Wallbanger
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Havana Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Hawaiian Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Highland Fling Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Imperial Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Irish Spring
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Jack Rose Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Japanese Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Jewel Of The Nile
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: John Collins
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

drinkRegister.name: Kamikaze
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Kentucky B And B
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

drinkRegister.name: Kentucky Colonel
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the courbon and Benedictine. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: Lady Love Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Loch Lomond
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: London Town
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Lone Tree Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Lone Tree Cooler
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

drinkRegister.name: Lord And Lady
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Mai Tai
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

drinkRegister.name: Martinez Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Martini
drinkRegister.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

drinkRegister.name: Midnight Cowboy
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Mississippi Planters Punch
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Monkey Wrench
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: New York Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Orange Oasis
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Orgasm
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Pink Gin
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

drinkRegister.name: Pink Lady
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Poppy Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Port And Starboard
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

drinkRegister.name: Port Wine Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Port Wine Flip
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Quaker's Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Queen Bee
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Queen Charlotte
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Queen Elizabeth
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Quentin
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinkRegister.name: Royal Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Royal Gin Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Cobbler
drinkRegister.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Cooler
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Milk Punch
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Old-fashioned
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Screwdriver
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Toddy
drinkRegister.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Rusty Nail
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: Salty Dog
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

drinkRegister.name: Sazerac
drinkRegister.instructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

drinkRegister.name: Scooter
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Scotch Cobbler
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Scotch Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Screwdriver
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Shanghai Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Sherry Eggnog
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Sherry Flip
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Sidecar
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Sidecar Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Singapore Sling
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Sol Y Sombra
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

drinkRegister.name: Stone Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Strawberry Margarita
drinkRegister.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Tequila Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Tequila Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Thriller
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Tom Collins
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinkRegister.name: Turf Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Tuxedo Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

drinkRegister.name: Valencia Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Van Vleet
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Vermouth Cassis
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Vesuvio
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Veteran
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Victor
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Victory Collins
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Vodka And Tonic
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Waikiki Beachcomber
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Whisky Mac
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

drinkRegister.name: White Russian
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Afterglow
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix. Serve over ice.

drinkRegister.name: Alice Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Apple Karate
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinkRegister.name: Bora Bora
drinkRegister.instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Orangeade
drinkRegister.instructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

drinkRegister.name: Rail Splitter
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

drinkRegister.name: Banana Milk Shake
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend very well, preferably in a household mixer. Serve in a wine glass, garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

drinkRegister.name: Banana Strawberry Shake
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

drinkRegister.name: Banana Strawberry Shake Daiquiri-type
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

drinkRegister.name: Egg Cream
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.

drinkRegister.name: Fruit Cooler
drinkRegister.instructions: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Fruit Flip-Flop
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinkRegister.name: Fruit Shake
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend til smooth.

drinkRegister.name: Just a Moonmint
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinkRegister.name: Lassi - A South Indian Drink
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.

drinkRegister.name: Lassi Khara
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

drinkRegister.name: Lassi Raita
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

drinkRegister.name: Lassi - Sweet
drinkRegister.instructions: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

drinkRegister.name: Lassi - Mango
drinkRegister.instructions: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

drinkRegister.name: Lemouroudji
drinkRegister.instructions: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Limeade
drinkRegister.instructions: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass. Drink. Repeat until limes or soda run out.

drinkRegister.name: Imperial Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie
drinkRegister.instructions: Juice cantaloupe, pour juice into blender, add banana, and liquify.

drinkRegister.name: Apple Berry Smoothie
drinkRegister.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinkRegister.name: Grape lemon pineapple Smoothie
drinkRegister.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinkRegister.name: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
drinkRegister.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinkRegister.name: Mango Orange Smoothie
drinkRegister.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinkRegister.name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
drinkRegister.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

drinkRegister.name: Kill the cold Smoothie
drinkRegister.instructions: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardomom.

drinkRegister.name: Strawberry Shivers
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinkRegister.name: Sweet Bananas
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinkRegister.name: Tomato Tang
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinkRegister.name: Yoghurt Cooler
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up. Note: Use lots of ice in this one - great on hot days! To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

drinkRegister.name: Castillian Hot Chocolate
drinkRegister.instructions: Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water, and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. Begin heating the mixture, stirring it with a whisk, and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring often, until it is thick, glossy and completely smooth. Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

drinkRegister.name: Chocolate Beverage
drinkRegister.instructions: Boil milk in the top of a deep double boiler five minutes. Remove from fire and add chocolate, mixed with the cinnamon, a little at a time, beating with molinillo or egg beater after each addition. When the chocolate is thoroughly blended, heat to the boiling point. Place over bottom of double boiler and add eggs, whipping constantly, until they are thoroughly blended and the mixture is frothing. Serve in coffee mug. Serves eight.

drinkRegister.name: Chocolate Drink
drinkRegister.instructions: Melt the bar in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently (with a whisk, i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.

drinkRegister.name: Drinking Chocolate
drinkRegister.instructions: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.

drinkRegister.name: Hot Chocolate to Die for
drinkRegister.instructions: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.

drinkRegister.name: Microwave Hot Cocoa
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine sugar, cocoa, salt and hot water in 1-quart micro-proof measuring cup (or coffee mug). Microwave at HIGH (100%) for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until boiling. Add milk, sitr and microwave an additonal 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until hot. Stir in vanilla, blend well.

drinkRegister.name: Nuked Hot Chocolate
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

drinkRegister.name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

drinkRegister.name: Spanish chocolate
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

drinkRegister.name: Lemon Shot
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass. light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second. Do shot quickly and suck on lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

drinkRegister.name: Sex on the Beach
drinkRegister.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

drinkRegister.name: Autodafé
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix and fill up with soda water. Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

drinkRegister.name: Gagliardo
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

drinkRegister.name: Surf City Lifesaver
drinkRegister.instructions: Lots of ice and soda top up in tall glass with cherry and a grin.

drinkRegister.name: Grizzly Bear
drinkRegister.instructions: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

drinkRegister.name: Karsk
drinkRegister.instructions: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

drinkRegister.name: Happy Skipper
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

drinkRegister.name: Frappé
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix together. Blend at highest blender speed for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold (if you make fresh coffee, mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

drinkRegister.name: Iced Coffee
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in coffee mug.

drinkRegister.name: Iced Coffee Fillip
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

drinkRegister.name: Masala Chai
drinkRegister.instructions: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

drinkRegister.name: Melya
drinkRegister.instructions: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

drinkRegister.name: Spiking coffee
drinkRegister.instructions: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.

drinkRegister.name: Thai Coffee
drinkRegister.instructions: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

drinkRegister.name: Thai Iced Coffee
drinkRegister.instructions: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

drinkRegister.name: Thai Iced Tea
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

drinkRegister.name: Absinthe #2
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix together and let sit a few days. Strain through a coffee filter. To serve mix 1 part absinthe to 4 parts water, add ice, enjoy.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Liqueur
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine sugar and 3/4 cup water in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer until all sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. In an aging container, combine apricot halves, almond extract, grain alcohol with 1/2 cup water, and brandy. Stir in cooled sugar syrup mixture. Cap and let age for 2 days. Remove apricot halves. (Save apricot halves, can be used for cooking). Add food coloring and glycerine. Stir, recap and continue aging for 1 to 2 months. Re-bottle as desired. Liqueur is ready to serve but will continue to improve with additional aging.

drinkRegister.name: Angelica Liqueur
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all herbs, nuts and spices with vodka in a 1 quart or larger aging container. Cap tightly and shake daily for 2 weeks. Strain through a fine muslin cloth or coffee filter, discarding solids. Clean out aging container. Place liquid back in container. Place sugar and water in saucepan and stir to combine over medium heat. When sugar is completely dissolved, set aside and let cool. When cool combine with food coloring and add to liqueur liquid. Cap and allow to age and mellow in a cool, dark place for one month.

drinkRegister.name: Caribbean Orange Liqueur
drinkRegister.instructions: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the oranges (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups vodka. Close jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until the vodka has absorbed the flavor. Remove peel and add remaining vodka. Close jar and add remaining cup of vodka. Close the jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age.

drinkRegister.name: Coffee Liqueur
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

drinkRegister.name: Coffee-Vodka
drinkRegister.instructions: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka, then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.

drinkRegister.name: Cranberry Cordial
drinkRegister.instructions: Place the chopped cranberries in a 2 liter jar that has a tight-fitting lid. Add the sugar and rum. Adjust the lid securely and place the jar in a cool, dark place. Invert the jar and shake it every day for six weeks. Strain the cordial into bottles and seal with corks.

drinkRegister.name: Creme de Menthe
drinkRegister.instructions: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.

drinkRegister.name: Irish Cream
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add rest.

drinkRegister.name: Scottish Highland Liqueur
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

drinkRegister.name: Tia-Maria
drinkRegister.instructions: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

drinkRegister.name: Aloha Fruit punch
drinkRegister.instructions: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger root. Boil 3 minutes. Strain. Add the liquid to the guava, lemon and pineapple juices. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water. Cool. Combine with juices and pineapple. Chill throroughly.

drinkRegister.name: Apple Cider Punch #1
drinkRegister.instructions: If you use the whole all spice and cloves, tie them in cheesecloth. Heat the mixture. Stir occasionally. If you want an alcoholic drink, rum would be nice.
